html:
2025-0464
2025-04-07FIN, GACCustoms TariffOrder Amending the United States Surtax Order (2025-1) and the United States Surtax Order (Steel and Aluminum 2025)Order Amending the UNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (2025-1) and the UNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (STEEL AND ALUMINUM 2025) in order to (1) exempt poultry and egg products covered by the Order, provided they are eligible to be imported through Supplemental Import Permits issued under Canada's Import for Re-export Program (IREP); and (2) exempt personal or household goods acquired in the U.S. and imported into Canada by residents of Campobello Island, in New Brunswick.N/A
subject: Order Amending the United States Surtax Order (2025-1) and the United States Surtax Order (Steel and Aluminum 2025)
precis: Order Amending the UNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (2025-1) and the UNITED STATES SURTAX ORDER (STEEL AND ALUMINUM 2025) in order to (1) exempt poultry and egg products covered by the Order, provided they are eligible to be imported through Supplemental Import Permits issued under Canada's Import for Re-export Program (IREP); and (2) exempt personal or household goods acquired in the U.S. and imported into Canada by residents of Campobello Island, in New Brunswick.
